preferred_locations: Remote (open to fully remote or hybrid arrangements)

availability_window.notes: Available from the start of June 2026 when the spring academic term concludes. Must conclude by end of August 2026 before the autumn term resumes. Ideal duration is 8–12 weeks.

education.institution: IE University – School of Science and Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Data and Business Analytics

mathematics_and_statistics: Simulating and Modeling to Understand Change
Probability and Statistics for Data Management and Analysis
Mathematics for Data Management and Analysis (Linear Algebra)
Introduction to Business and Social Analytics
programming_and_computer_science: Introduction to Programming for Data Science (R)
Programming for Data Management and Analysis (Python, SQL, PySpark)
Advanced Data Structures and Storage (NoSQL, RAID, Cloud)
Operating Systems and Parallel Computing (Linux, CUDA, GPU)
data_science_and_ml: Learning to Observe, Experiment and Survey

statistics: Descriptive statistics: mean, median, variance, standard deviation, box plots, scatter plots
Probability theory: Bayes theorem, conditional probability, distributions
Sampling and sampling distributions, Central Limit Theorem
Hypothesis testing: one and two sample, ANOVA, non-parametric tests
Goodness-of-fit tests, contingency tables, Wilcoxon, Mann-Whitney
Multivariate analysis: PCA, cluster analysis, multiple regression, logistic regression, discriminant analysis
Time series decomposition (STL, classical), autocorrelation, stationarity
mathematics: Limits, derivatives, integration, fundamental theorem of calculus
Vectors, matrices, systems of linear equations
Matrix operations, LU factorisation, inverses, determinants
Vector spaces, null space, column space, linear independence
Inner product, orthogonality, least squares, SVD fundamentals
programming_r: Data types and variables in R
Reading and writing files (CSV, Excel, JSON)
Statistical functions: t.test, prop.test, aov, chisq.test, varTest
Visualisation: ggplot2, scatter plots, histograms, bar charts, heatmaps, boxplots, wordclouds, Leaflet maps
R packages: dplyr, VCD, simmer, forecast
Random number and random variable generation
Time series modelling: decomposition, ARIMA, exponential smoothing in R
Social network analysis, text mining in R
programming_python: Data types, variables, loops, functions, OOP
Lists, strings, file I/O, GUI programming (Graphics.py)
Pandas: DataFrames, data cleaning, transformation, aggregation
Matplotlib: line plots, scatter plots, bar charts, histograms, pie charts
PySpark: RDDs, DataFrames, map/reduce, lambda functions, filtering, sorting, key-value pairs
Multidimensional arrays (tensors), sparse vs dense representations
Data compression in Python (entropy coding, DCT, watermarking)
Machine learning pipelines in Python (scikit-learn style)
Neural network coding (forward/backward propagation, activation functions, optimisers)
Model evaluation: confusion matrix, ROC curves, F1, accuracy, cross-validation
Multivariate analysis: PCA, cluster analysis, regression in Python
Logistic regression, SVM, Naive Bayes, decision trees in Python
algorithms_and_data_structures: Big O notation and asymptotic analysis
Search algorithms: binary search, breadth-first, depth-first
Object-Oriented Programming: classes, inheritance, special methods
Trees: binary trees, AVL trees, Red-Black trees, heaps, priority queues
data_structures_and_storage: Sparse vs dense representations (COO, DOK, CSR)
Lossless compression: run-length encoding, entropy coding, Huffman
Error detection: checksumming, hash functions, parity, watermarking
Disk and memory management: RAID (striping, mirroring, parity), serialisation, virtualisation
NoSQL databases: key-value, document (MongoDB), column-family (Cassandra), graph (Neo4j, Gremlin)
Cloud storage: virtualisation, containerisation (Docker), cloud models
operating_systems_and_parallel_computing: OS principles, architecture, kernels, processes, threads
Deadlocks, memory management, CPU scheduling (FCFS, SJF, Round Robin)
Linux OS: directory structure, commands, daemons, services
Parallel computer architecture: shared memory, distributed memory
Parallel programming in Python: shared address space
Big Data: Hadoop, NoSQL, cloud computing
Cloud implementation: AWS, GCP, Oracle Cloud
machine_learning: Model evaluation metrics: accuracy, F1, precision, recall, AUC-ROC
Neural networks: perceptron, MLP, forward/backward propagation, dropout
Representation learning, transfer learning, contrastive learning
Sequential modelling for time series with deep learning
Model deployment, data drift, model lifecycle
Generative AI, RAG systems, AI agents
research_methods: Scientific research process: hypothesis, variables, operationalisation
Reliability and validity (face, content, criterion, construct)

International logistics coordination – managed global shipments for a fashion startup

Digital strategy and social media management

experience.title: Office Manager Assistant / Junior Marketing Analyst
experience.summary: Joined as the most junior member of a 6-person international team at a fast-growing haute couture startup with offices in Stockholm and Paris. Proposed and implemented the brand's first social media content strategy across all digital platforms. Coordinated international logistics including shipments between ateliers, suppliers, offices in Stockholm and Paris, and global customers. Supported the commercial segment: website content improvement, competitive benchmarking, and global high-fashion wholesaler identification. Helped prepare for and coordinate onsite at Paris Haute Couture Week. Contributed to developing a technical solution for clothing authenticity certification/tags. Gained deep understanding of end-to-end supply chain through the brand's GOTS sustainability certification process. Later worked on-site in Paris while maintaining collaboration with Stockholm team.
key_skills_used: Social media strategy and content creation

experience.title: Employee
experience.summary: Supervised amusement attractions and worked as cashier. First professional work experience, developing customer service and reliability skills.

extracurricular_and_leadership.role: President and Co-Founder – VRG Book Club
extracurricular_and_leadership.summary: Founded and led a school book club that grew across three Stockholm schools. Invited authors and entrepreneurs as guest speakers. Ran social media campaigns and a Red Cross book donation drive. Negotiated with library for dedicated shelf space.
Community dedicated to supporting integration of new students.
Organised Christmas gift collections and Red Cross collaborations.
